00050 // Debug hooks

00052 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)

00054 void sp_scalar_constructor_hook(void * px, std::size_t size, void * pn);
00055 void sp_array_constructor_hook(void * px);
00056 void sp_scalar_destructor_hook(void * px, std::size_t size, void * pn);

00061 
00062 // The standard library that comes with Borland C++ 5.5.1
00063 // defines std::exception and its members as having C calling
00064 // convention (-pc). When the definition of bad_weak_ptr
00065 // is compiled with -ps, the compiler issues an error.
00066 // Hence, the temporary #pragma option -pc below. The version
00067 // check is deliberately conservative.
00068 
00069 #if defined(__BORLANDC__) && __BORLANDC__ == 0x551
00070 # pragma option push -pc
00071 #endif
00072 
00073 class bad_weak_ptr: public std::exception
00074 {
00075 public:
00076 
00077     virtual char const * what() const throw()
00078     {
00079         return "boost::bad_weak_ptr";
00080     }
00081 };
00082 
00083 #if defined(__BORLANDC__) && __BORLANDC__ == 0x551
00084 # pragma option pop
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 namespace detail
00088 {
00089 
00090 class sp_counted_base
00091 {
00092 private:
00093 
00094     typedef detail::lightweight_mutex mutex_type;
00095 
00096 public:
00097 
00098     sp_counted_base(): use_count_(1), weak_count_(1)
00099     {
00100     }
00101 
00102     virtual ~sp_counted_base() // nothrow
00103     {
00104     }
00105 
00106     // dispose() is called when use_count_ drops to zero, to release
00107     // the resources managed by *this.
00108 
00109     virtual void dispose() = 0; // nothrow
00110 
00111     // destruct() is called when weak_count_ drops to zero.
00112 
00113     virtual void destruct() // nothrow
00114     {
00115         delete this;
00116     }
00117 
00118     virtual void * get_deleter(std::type_info const & ti) = 0;
00119 
00120     void add_ref_copy()
00121     {
00122 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS)
00123         mutex_type::scoped_lock lock(mtx_);
00124 #endif
00125         ++use_count_;
00126     }
00127 
00128     void add_ref_lock()
00129     {
00130 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS)
00131         mutex_type::scoped_lock lock(mtx_);
00132 #endif
00133         if(use_count_ == 0) boost::throw_exception(boost::bad_weak_ptr());
00134         ++use_count_;
00135     }
00136 
00137     void release() // nothrow
00138     {
00139         {
00140 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS)
00141             mutex_type::scoped_lock lock(mtx_);
00142 #endif
00143             long new_use_count = --use_count_;
00144 
00145             if(new_use_count != 0) return;
00146         }
00147 
00148         dispose();
00149         weak_release();
00150     }
00151 
00152     void weak_add_ref() // nothrow
00153     {
00154 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS)
00155         mutex_type::scoped_lock lock(mtx_);
00156 #endif
00157         ++weak_count_;
00158     }
00159 
00160     void weak_release() // nothrow
00161     {
00162         long new_weak_count;
00163 
00164         {
00165 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS)
00166             mutex_type::scoped_lock lock(mtx_);
00167 #endif
00168             new_weak_count = --weak_count_;
00169         }
00170 
00171         if(new_weak_count == 0)
00172         {
00173             destruct();
00174         }
00175     }
00176 
00177     long use_count() const // nothrow
00178     {
00179 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS)
00180         mutex_type::scoped_lock lock(mtx_);
00181 #endif
00182         return use_count_;
00183     }
00184 
00185 private:
00186 
00187     sp_counted_base(sp_counted_base const &);
00188     sp_counted_base & operator= (sp_counted_base const &);
00189 
00190     long use_count_;        // #shared
00191     long weak_count_;       // #weak + (#shared != 0)
00192 
00193 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS) || defined(BOOST_LWM_WIN32)
00194     mutable mutex_type mtx_;
00195 #endif
00196 };
00197 
00198 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00199 
00200 template<class T> void cbi_call_constructor_hook(sp_counted_base * pn, T * px, checked_deleter<T> const &, int)
00201 {
00202     boost::sp_scalar_constructor_hook(px, sizeof(T), pn);
00203 }
00204 
00205 template<class T> void cbi_call_constructor_hook(sp_counted_base *, T * px, checked_array_deleter<T> const &, int)
00206 {
00207     boost::sp_array_constructor_hook(px);
00208 }
00209 
00210 template<class P, class D> void cbi_call_constructor_hook(sp_counted_base *, P const &, D const &, long)
00211 {
00212 }
00213 
00214 template<class T> void cbi_call_destructor_hook(sp_counted_base * pn, T * px, checked_deleter<T> const &, int)
00215 {
00216     boost::sp_scalar_destructor_hook(px, sizeof(T), pn);
00217 }
00218 
00219 template<class T> void cbi_call_destructor_hook(sp_counted_base *, T * px, checked_array_deleter<T> const &, int)
00220 {
00221     boost::sp_array_destructor_hook(px);
00222 }
00223 
00224 template<class P, class D> void cbi_call_destructor_hook(sp_counted_base *, P const &, D const &, long)
00225 {
00226 }
00227 
00228 #endif

00230 //
00231 // Borland's Codeguard trips up over the -Vx- option here:
00232 //
00233 #ifdef __CODEGUARD__
00234 # pragma option push -Vx-
00235 #endif
00236 
00237 template<class P, class D> class sp_counted_base_impl: public sp_counted_base
00238 {
00239 private:
00240 
00241     P ptr; // copy constructor must not throw
00242     D del; // copy constructor must not throw
00243 
00244     sp_counted_base_impl(sp_counted_base_impl const &);
00245     sp_counted_base_impl & operator= (sp_counted_base_impl const &);
00246 
00247     typedef sp_counted_base_impl<P, D> this_type;
00248 
00249 public:
00250 
00251     // pre: initial_use_count <= initial_weak_count, d(p) must not throw
00252 
00253     sp_counted_base_impl(P p, D d): ptr(p), del(d)
00254     {
00255 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00256         detail::cbi_call_constructor_hook(this, p, d, 0);
00257 #endif
00258     }
00259 
00260     virtual void dispose() // nothrow
00261     {
00262 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00263         detail::cbi_call_destructor_hook(this, ptr, del, 0);
00264 #endif
00265         del(ptr);
00266     }
00267 
00268     virtual void * get_deleter(std::type_info const & ti)
00269     {
00270         return ti == typeid(D)? &del: 0;
00271     }
00272 
00273 #if defined(BOOST_SP_USE_STD_ALLOCATOR)
00274 
00275     void * operator new(std::size_t)
00276     {
00277         return std::allocator<this_type>().allocate(1, static_cast<this_type *>(0));
00278     }
00279 
00280     void operator delete(void * p)
00281     {
00282         std::allocator<this_type>().deallocate(static_cast<this_type *>(p), 1);
00283     }
00284 
00285 #endif
00286 
00287 #if defined(BOOST_SP_USE_QUICK_ALLOCATOR)
00288 
00289     void * operator new(std::size_t)
00290     {
00291         return quick_allocator<this_type>::alloc();
00292     }
00293 
00294     void operator delete(void * p)
00295     {
00296         quick_allocator<this_type>::dealloc(p);
00297     }
00298 
00299 #endif
00300 };
00301 
00302 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00303 
00304 int const shared_count_id = 0x2C35F101;
00305 int const   weak_count_id = 0x298C38A4;
00306 
00307 #endif
00308 
00309 class weak_count;
00310 
00311 class shared_count
00312 {
00313 private:
00314 
00315     sp_counted_base * pi_;
00316 
00317 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00318     int id_;
00319 #endif
00320 
00321     friend class weak_count;
00322 
00323 public:
00324 
00325     shared_count(): pi_(0) // nothrow
00326 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00327         , id_(shared_count_id)
00328 #endif
00329     {
00330     }
00331 
00332     template<class P, class D> shared_count(P p, D d): pi_(0)
00333 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00334         , id_(shared_count_id)
00335 #endif
00336     {
00337 #ifndef BOOST_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00338 
00339         try
00340         {
00341             pi_ = new sp_counted_base_impl<P, D>(p, d);
00342         }
00343         catch(...)
00344         {
00345             d(p); // delete p
00346             throw;
00347         }
00348 
00349 #else
00350 
00351         pi_ = new sp_counted_base_impl<P, D>(p, d);
00352 
00353         if(pi_ == 0)
00354         {
00355             d(p); // delete p
00356             boost::throw_exception(std::bad_alloc());
00357         }
00358 
00359 #endif
00360     }
00361 
00362 #ifndef BOOST_NO_AUTO_PTR
00363 
00364     // auto_ptr<Y> is special cased to provide the strong guarantee
00365 
00366     template<class Y>
00367     explicit shared_count(std::auto_ptr<Y> & r): pi_(new sp_counted_base_impl< Y *, checked_deleter<Y> >(r.get(), checked_deleter<Y>()))
00368 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00369         , id_(shared_count_id)
00370 #endif
00371     {
00372         r.release();
00373     }
00374 
00375 #endif 
00376 
00377     ~shared_count() // nothrow
00378     {
00379         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->release();
00380 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00381         id_ = 0;
00382 #endif
00383     }
00384 
00385     shared_count(shared_count const & r): pi_(r.pi_) // nothrow
00386 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00387         , id_(shared_count_id)
00388 #endif
00389     {
00390         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->add_ref_copy();
00391     }
00392 
00393     explicit shared_count(weak_count const & r); // throws bad_weak_ptr when r.use_count() == 0
00394 
00395     shared_count & operator= (shared_count const & r) // nothrow
00396     {
00397         sp_counted_base * tmp = r.pi_;
00398         if(tmp != 0) tmp->add_ref_copy();
00399         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->release();
00400         pi_ = tmp;
00401 
00402         return *this;
00403     }
00404 
00405     void swap(shared_count & r) // nothrow
00406     {
00407         sp_counted_base * tmp = r.pi_;
00408         r.pi_ = pi_;
00409         pi_ = tmp;
00410     }
00411 
00412     long use_count() const // nothrow
00413     {
00414         return pi_ != 0? pi_->use_count(): 0;
00415     }
00416 
00417     bool unique() const // nothrow
00418     {
00419         return use_count() == 1;
00420     }
00421 
00422     friend inline bool operator==(shared_count const & a, shared_count const & b)
00423     {
00424         return a.pi_ == b.pi_;
00425     }
00426 
00427     friend inline bool operator<(shared_count const & a, shared_count const & b)
00428     {
00429         return std::less<sp_counted_base *>()(a.pi_, b.pi_);
00430     }
00431 
00432     void * get_deleter(std::type_info const & ti) const
00433     {
00434         return pi_? pi_->get_deleter(ti): 0;
00435     }
00436 };

00443 class weak_count
00444 {
00445 private:
00446 
00447     sp_counted_base * pi_;
00448 
00449 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00450     int id_;
00451 #endif
00452 
00453     friend class shared_count;
00454 
00455 public:
00456 
00457     weak_count(): pi_(0) // nothrow
00458 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00459         , id_(weak_count_id)
00460 #endif
00461     {
00462     }
00463 
00464     weak_count(shared_count const & r): pi_(r.pi_) // nothrow
00465 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00466         , id_(shared_count_id)
00467 #endif
00468     {
00469         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->weak_add_ref();
00470     }
00471 
00472     weak_count(weak_count const & r): pi_(r.pi_) // nothrow
00473 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00474         , id_(shared_count_id)
00475 #endif
00476     {
00477         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->weak_add_ref();
00478     }
00479 
00480     ~weak_count() // nothrow
00481     {
00482         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->weak_release();
00483 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00484         id_ = 0;
00485 #endif
00486     }
00487 
00488     weak_count & operator= (shared_count const & r) // nothrow
00489     {
00490         sp_counted_base * tmp = r.pi_;
00491         if(tmp != 0) tmp->weak_add_ref();
00492         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->weak_release();
00493         pi_ = tmp;
00494 
00495         return *this;
00496     }
00497 
00498     weak_count & operator= (weak_count const & r) // nothrow
00499     {
00500         sp_counted_base * tmp = r.pi_;
00501         if(tmp != 0) tmp->weak_add_ref();
00502         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->weak_release();
00503         pi_ = tmp;
00504 
00505         return *this;
00506     }
00507 
00508     void swap(weak_count & r) // nothrow
00509     {
00510         sp_counted_base * tmp = r.pi_;
00511         r.pi_ = pi_;
00512         pi_ = tmp;
00513     }
00514 
00515     long use_count() const // nothrow
00516     {
00517         return pi_ != 0? pi_->use_count(): 0;
00518     }
00519 
00520     friend inline bool operator==(weak_count const & a, weak_count const & b)
00521     {
00522         return a.pi_ == b.pi_;
00523     }
00524 
00525     friend inline bool operator<(weak_count const & a, weak_count const & b)
00526     {
00527         return std::less<sp_counted_base *>()(a.pi_, b.pi_);
00528     }
00529 };
00530 
00531 inline shared_count::shared_count(weak_count const & r): pi_(r.pi_)
00532 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00533         , id_(shared_count_id)
00534 #endif
00535 {
00536     if(pi_ != 0)
00537     {
00538         pi_->add_ref_lock();
00539     }
00540     else
00541     {
00542         boost::throw_exception(boost::bad_weak_ptr());
00543     }
00544 }
